nodes.name: Split In Batches (1 item per batch)

parameters.query:
SELECT 
    ba.id,
    ba.renie_bin_id,
    ba.alert_type,
    ba.bin_status_at_alert,
    ba.sent_at,
    ba.status,
    ba.poc_email,
    ba.reminder_sent_at,
    ba.reminder_email_sent_at,
    ba.reminder_whatsapp_sent_at,
    ba.responded_at,
    ba.resolved_at,
    ba.created_at,
    ba.updated_at,

    -- From bins table
    b.chip_id,
    b.current_status,
    b.current_status_date,
    b.last_event,
    b.details_position,
    b.online,
    b.review_image,
    b.qr_code_url,
    b.binarea_name,
    b.binarea_city,
    b.binarea_public,
    b.wmc_user_name,
    b.investor_name,
    b.poc_name,
    b.poc_designation,
    b.poc_email AS bin_poc_email,   -- avoid confusion with alertâ€™s poc_email
    b.poc_contact

FROM bin_alerts ba
JOIN bins b 
  ON TRIM(ba.renie_bin_id) = TRIM(b.renie_bin_id)
WHERE 
      (
        -- Case A: reminder was sent, no response, older than 24 hours
        ba.status = 'reminder_sent'
        AND ba.responded_at IS NULL
        AND GREATEST(
              COALESCE(ba.reminder_sent_at, '-infinity'),
              COALESCE(ba.reminder_email_sent_at, '-infinity'),
              COALESCE(ba.reminder_whatsapp_sent_at, '-infinity')
            ) <= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours'
      )
   OR (
        -- Case B: both reminders failed (immediate escalation)
        ba.status = 'failed_reminder'
        AND ba.responded_at IS NULL
      );

parameters.query:
UPDATE bin_alerts
SET 
    status = 'escalated',
    escalated_at = NOW(),
    updated_at = NOW()
  
WHERE TRIM(renie_bin_id) = TRIM('{{$node["Split In Batches (1 item per batch)"].json["renie_bin_id"]}}')
  
  AND status IN ('reminder_sent', 'failed_reminder')   -- donâ€™t overwrite if already resolved

  AND responded_at IS NULL;
